```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
market_sim <- here::here(read_csv("Market Simulator Version 01.xlsx"))

fluidPage(
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      title = "Personas",
      selectInput(
        inputId = "nationalnews",
        label = "Follow National News: Multiple Times a Day to Never",
        choices = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
      ),
      selectInput(
        inputId = "intnews",
        label = "Follow International News: Always to Never",
        choices = c(1, 2, 3)
      )
    ),
    mainPanel()
  )
)

```
